scripts.build: cp $(tinygo env TINYGOROOT)/targets/wasm_exec.js docs/js/lib/wasm_exec.js && GOTOOLCHAIN=go1.21.13+auto tinygo build -o ./docs/silicon8.wasm -target wasm ./src/wasm
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run run
scripts.assemble: echo 'Assembling all *.8o files...'; for file in `find . -type f -name "*.8o"`; do echo "  * $file"; target=${file%.8o}; octo $file ${target}.ch8; done
